name: Nana in the Dark
description: Nana who came to a strange place, To escape from there, you must survive from unidentified things! * Simple graphics * Cute characters * A little fear * Story *...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, ATI Radeon™ HD 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom™ II X3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
